# RemoteKeylessEntryAction.ExecutionRequest

**Class**

An object that reports the results of an automatically ending action asynchronously.

## Declaration

```swift
final class ExecutionRequest
```

## Overview

When you perform an action, the system creates a [doc://com.apple.CarKey/documentation/CarKey/RemoteKeylessEntryAction/ExecutionRequest] object for that request and returns it to your app. Use that object to asynchronously determine whether your request completed successfully or reported an error.

## Getting the Vehicle’s Respose

- **results()**: Returns the results of a preceding action request.
- **ExecutionStatus**: A type that contains the status code a vehicle returns after executing an action.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
